channel.title: Lifestyles on BaoQDau
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyles on BaoQDau

item.title: Tidy
item.description: discarding all at once intensely and completely tidy in the right order do not even think of putting things away until i have finished the process of discarding visualize my destination imagine what it would be like to live in a clutter free space visualization aid: look at interior decorating magazines the fuck this is pseudodeep why i want to design my home that way. after a few rounds of recursive quasi-scientific soul searching im supposed to find out that the point of doing this is to be happy

item.title: Lift
item.description: best 3 chest exercises: bench press incline dumbbell, remember to bring the dumbbells together cardio jumping jacks burpees bicycles ins outs open close shoulder to shoulder high knees shoulder reverse peck deck: side lateral raises seated overhead press 10 reps min leg smith machines: normal + chair squat + backward squat preacher shrimp dance step on one plate, weights on shoulder, squat down then stand up in the opposite direction smith machine calf raises, with plates 15 lunge while criss crossing kettlebells smith machine jumping lunge push smith machine with balls on your feet one legged squat jump over bench criss crossing on bench

item.title: Minigoal
item.description: Most important: track how I spend my time digitally fix arbtt and see where I am on the productivity scale brother Completely stop using Tiktok yikes stop playing mobile games now the question is. what am i going to do next. question when do i play games? only when i get home. why? is it because my house has a relaxational aspect to it? now how do I stop compulsively gaming?
